CustomField.description: I have reviewed the patient's outpatient medication with the patient and/or caregiver and the list accurately reflects the medications that the patient is currently taking, including any that may be provided by non-VA sources, over-the-counter medication, and nutritional and other supplements.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: I have reviewed the patient's outpatient medication with the patient and/or caregiver and the list accurately reflects the medications that the patient is currently taking, including any that may be provided by non-VA sources, over-the-counter medication, and nutritional and other supplements.
CustomField.label: Medication Reconciliation
